cmp: 半 (half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half/half)
mng: partner, companion, comrade, associate, to accompany

exm.mng: to accompany, to follow, to occur together with, concomitant
bridesmaid, maid of honor, matron of honor
vocal accompaniment, to accompany a singer, to support of sb, to echo sb, to chime in with sb
to accompany sb, to accompany each other
